There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done, Page said. Although he tried to debunk the idea in Thursday's interview, Eric Schmidt may have been growing weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinized companies.

Microsoft. Amitabh Srivastava joined in 1997 and started Project Red Dog in 2006, which became the Azure compute fabric. No reason was given for his exit, but Steve Ballmer said in his email about Satya Nadella 's appointment: Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career.
